scripts.cp:md: exitzero bash -c "pwd && cd packages && pwd && find . -name '*.MD' -exec cp -R {} ../dist/{} \; && cd .."
scripts.cp:authors: exitzero bash -c "cd dist && find . -type d -exec cp ../AUTHORS.MD {} ; && cd .."
scripts.cp:json: exitzero bash -c "cd packages && find . -name '*.json' -exec cp -R {} ../dist/{} ; && cd .."
scripts.cp:all: npm run cp:md && npm run cp:json && npm run cp:authors
scripts.compile:docs: exitzero typedoc -t ES7 --jsx react --readme none --hideGenerator --name Meteor.Framework --ignoreCompilerErrors --theme minimal --out ./docs ./ && echo Hi there, i am F6CF > ./docs/.nojekyll
scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:docs
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:code && npm run clean:docs
scripts.publish:git: git add . && git commit && git push -u origin master
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:lerna && npm run publish:git
scripts.sdelay_zaebis: npm run clean:all && npm run compile:all && npm run cp:all && npm run publish:all
